articles.title: 'What's not to loathe?' Jeremy Vine savaged by Jeremy Kyle in brutal take down of cyclists - Express
articles.description: JEREMY KYLE blasted Channel 5 presenter Jeremy Vine during Wednesday's Uncensored, as he launched into a rant about cyclists being on the roads while not paying for tax or insurance.
